lines.english:
A fheara is ar mhná na hÉireann
In the past few months, there has been an exponential rise in anti-social behaviours in our community
lines.irish:
Men and women of Ireland,
Le cúpla mí anuas, tá borradh ollmhór tagtha ar iompar frithshóisialta inár bpobal

lines.english: We've had numerous reports by concerned residents in regards to youths smoking marijuana, defecating on public walls, and off their heads on - quote - "málaí móra ket"
lines.irish: Tá neart tuairiscí faighte againn ó chónaitheoirí buartha faoi dhéagóirí ag caitheamh marijuana, ag déanamh cac ar bhallaí poiblí, agus as a meabhair ar – lúitear – “málaí móra ket”

lines.english: Now, let this be a warning to all the drug dealers, purple heads, and wee shites, to stop immediately in all drug activity
lines.irish: Anois, bíodh sé seo ina rabhadh do na mangairí drugaí, na cinn chorcra, agus na gobdars beaga: stad leis an ngníomhaíocht drugaí láithreach

lines.english:
(John, next time don't forget to mention our name
I know will ya fuck up)
lines.irish:
(A John, an chéad uair eile ná déan dearmad ár n-ainm a lua
Tá a fhios agam – dún do bhéal, le do thoil)

lines.english: We, the Radical Republicans Against Drugs, will no longer tolerate these parasites sucking the life out of our community with their excessive, hedonistic, toxic lifestyles
lines.irish: Ní ghlacfaidh muid, Poblachtaigh Rádacacha in Éadan Drugaí, le tuilleadh den pharasítíocht seo a bhfuil saol antoisceach, heidinéach, nimhneach acu atá ag slogadh an tsaoil as ár bpobal

lines.english: From today onward, anyone found taking drugs are legitimate targets, and anyone found selling narcotics will be brought forward to be kneecapped
lines.irish: Ón lá inniu ar aghaidh, is spriocanna dlisteanacha iad siúd a bhítear ag glacadh drugaí, agus cuirfear aon duine a dhíolann substaintí mídhleathacha os comhair breithiúnais – le lámh a chur ina nglúine
